resources.string:
Resolution or aspect ratio is not supported
The current game only supports:
%s

Please modify with the following settings:
%s
%s
With just a few simple steps, you re ready to start playing, click on " %s " to get started.
To play the game, you must install the PS3 firmware (PS3UPDAT.PUP). Please select the firmware file.
Please specify the PS3 ISO directory, the APP will automatically scan to retrieve valid games, you can also skip this step and install the .pkg file directly.
Please select a font file (*.ttf, *.ttc, *.otf) to install, or you can use a font from the PS3 firmware (words may be missing).
Please select a GPU driver, you can also skip this step (the game may run with errors).
The emulator will automatically select the most suitable configuration, but some configurations may cause issues on your device. You can modify them later in the settings.
Running undecrypted games is not supported at this time
The list of games is empty, please add games by installing pkg or setting the *.iso directory

Thanks Ruban for all the ICONS

 Thanks to SRC267 (Sting) for managing reddit/discord

 Thanks to 妖妖 for test

 Thanks to 再见某人 for donating GPD XP, which has been a great help in the testing process.

 Thanks to 再见某人 for donating the development equipment, which has been instrumental in advancing the project.

 Thanks to the following people who provided financial support for this project (Initial stage,sort by date):
Based on the RPCS3 transplantation optimization, thanks to all the participants of the RPCS3 project\n\n Translation qwen3
Accurate PPU 128-byte Reservation Op Max Length
Lock overlay input to player one
Pause emulation on RPCS3 focus loss
Prevent display sleep while running games
Show mouse and keyboard toggle hint

Start on the PS Vita system.\nIf you have not installed, go to [Remote Play] on the PS Vita system and start [Cross-Controller] from the LiveArea™ screen.
If your system software version on the PS Vita system is earlier than 1.80, you must update the system software to the latest version.

SaveState failed: Failed to lock SPU state, using SPU ASMJIT will fix it.
